title: Calculator App PRD
overview: A simple calculator application that performs basic arithmetic operations with input validation and a clean UI

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to add two numbers so that I can perform addition calculations
As a user, I want to subtract numbers so that I can perform subtraction calculations
As a user, I want to multiply numbers so that I can perform multiplication calculations
As a user, I want to divide numbers so that I can perform division calculations
acceptance_criteria: Division by zero is handled gracefully

user_stories.description: As a user, I want input validation so that I cannot enter invalid data
acceptance_criteria: Non-numeric input is rejected with clear error message
All four basic operations work correctly
